getWhitelist().details: If a registry id is not yet registered, the null address will be appended to the list instead.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.index: Index of address in the whitelist.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

selfDestruct().details: The balance of this contract is returned to the owner.

params.registryAddress: The address of a registry contract for routing to other contracts.

params._registeredContracts: The new whitelist of registered contract ids.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.contractIdentifier: The id of the contract to be added.

devdoc.title: Holds a whitelist of addresses for which transfers should not be frozen so that network initialization can take place.

getNumberOfWhitelistedContractIdentifier.notice: Gets the number of registered contracts

getWhitelist().notice: Appends the addresses of registered contracts to the whitelist before returning the list.

removeAddress(address,uint256).notice: Remove an address from the whitelist.

selfDestruct().notice: Clears all data (storage and bytecode) at this contract's address.

setRegistry(address).notice: Updates the address pointing to a Registry contract.

setWhitelistedContractIdentifiers(bytes3.notice: Set the whitelist of registered contracts.

whitelistAddress(address).notice: Add an address to the whitelist.

whitelistRegisteredContract(bytes32).notice: Adds the registry id of a whitelisted contract.
